urls.title: Animal coronavirus vaccines: lessons for SARS - PubMed
urls.description: Severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) emerged in China and spread globally as a human pandemic. It is caused by a new coronavirus (CoV) of suspect animal origin. The emergence of SARS stunned medical scientists, but veterinary virologists had previously recognized CoVs as causing fatal respirator …

text: @piersmorgan @CollignonPeter But there are vaccines for Coronavirus in animals already https://t.co/2txqvmMhiy
